title: Crowdfunding custom drone with no Chinese parts

replies.msg:
Friend of mine with years of professionally building drones for drone company can build a custom drone with no Chinese software or hardware for reconnaissance.

Would there be interest to crowdfund?

Drones have been unable to operate when sieges like Poly U and CUHK happen because drones like DJI operate the GPS is shut off in the software because it is Chinese built. I know some scouts use drones and it could be useful to prevent getting flanked and stampedes like in Yau Ma Tei. Cost should be about 10,000HKD per drone, but drone would be able to outmaneuver anti drone measures and GPS jammers
Interested, how can I contact you?

quote.msg: Interested, how can I contact you?
